Topic.Title: KO has a problem being a new Competitor

Message.Msg: SodaStream is a fabulous product, but it is more of a niche product than a serious KO competitor. Take a look at the breadth of KO products. I consider KO a water play as well.

Topic.Title: KO has a problem being a new Competitor

Message.Msg: The problem for KO trades with a PE which expects growth. When you are loosing market share to Soda you deserve a lower PE. Soda is getting the heavy soda drinkers and will cause growth for KO to slow. Maybe small initially but will only get worse as Soda is following the same trajectory in terms of number us users as Keuirig.

Topic.Title: KO has a problem being a new Competitor

Message.Msg: Soda stream was a product of the 1960's. I had one then. It failed then and will fail now. Its just a novelty, a passing fad.

Message.Title: sold today
Message.Msg: Not going to own a stock that fought prop 37 in California. What do you have to hide KO? Also, I don't want anything to do with a stock heavily owned by the promoter of prostate cancer, Buffet the buffoon.
I would not be in the market with "any" company if I were you.
Fossil Fuel... Bad, Buffet... Bad, Coal... Bad, Banks... Bad, Government Motors... Bad Fast Food... Bad Prostate Cancer... Try JNJ, RGEN, CYNO AND VRTX until the recalls. Need I go further?
